main event: A witness and his mother observed a red light they initially thought was an airplane during the night hours of 17-18 May 1968.
interesting points: The red light did not go out or dim, leading the observers to change their initial thought about it being an airplane., The sighting was reported several months later in December 1968., The observer noticed a bright light on the southwest horizon on 4 May 1968 that was pulsating and changing color., The light remained stationary for about one hour before rapidly disappearing., This case is classified as having insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: a red light in the sky
